issue.title: Atlas V1 falls when put in user mode. DRCSIM 4.2

content.raw:
**Without BDI controller**

1. Atlas v5: Stands on start, and doesn't fall over when switching to User mode
1. Atlas v4: Stands on start, and doesn't fall over when switching to User mode
1. Atlas v3: Does not stand on start
1. Atlas v1: Stands on start, and falls over when switching to User mode

**With BDI controller**

1. Atlas v5: Stands on start, and falls over when switching to User mode
1. Atlas v4: Stands on start, and falls over when switching to User mode 
1. Atlas v3: Does not stand on start
1. Atlas v1: Stands on start, and falls over when switching to User mode

**Here are the problems in order of priority**

1. With BDI controller, Atlas v5 & v4: Stands on start, and falls over when switching to User mode
1. With and without BDI controller, Atlas v3 does not stand.
1. With and without BDI controller, Atlas v1 falls over when switching to User mode.
